app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Rec Translator Voice to Text
app_description: Rec translator is a free unlimited recording smart translation application. It has excellent recording recognition services supports multi language real time recording to text. It also has efficient translation functions such as photo translation voice translation etc. it meets various needs such as recording voice conversion characters character extraction online translation etc. TOP FEATURES 1 Record Transcribe Live the latest feature Support real time recording voice to text which can accurately and quickly convert the content of real time recording voice into text. 2 Photo translation Auto recognize and translate text in the photo from any language to any language. Menu books road signs you can take photos at will and get translation results in time. 3 Real time dialogue translation Just speak to the phone say what you want to convey and get the real time translation. 4 Multilingual text translation Support more than 50 languages you can translate the converted text of the recording voice into various languages you need. 5 Free export and sharing It supports free editing and copying of recording text conversion results so as to export and share them to e mail social software and other platforms. Subscription VIP terms Weekly subscription: 5.99 per week Annual subscription: 69.99 per year The price in different regions will be adjusted according to the local actual situation and tax policy please take the actual price as the standard. Your free trial subscription will automatically renew to a paid subscription. 24 hours before the subscription service expires the system will automatically renew and deduct the corresponding fee according to the subscription type. You can cancel the free trial or subscription at any time by turning off automatic renewal through the iTunes account settings. This operation must be completed 24 hours before the end of the free trial or subscription period to avoid charges. Once you cancel your subscription you will no longer be able to enjoy the content and functions of the subscription member. Non subscription members can still use the app normally.
